title: Overly Vague Prophecy
desc:
Post 1691
- Following the turn order starting at the current turn, you will learn the first color and the last Post Number digit of a random card from each player's hand (including your own).
- The chosen card will be one that can be played on the previously revealed color/digit. (If it's the first card in the list, it can be any card).
- If any player has no cards that fit the above criteria, '<:colorless:1106434944261177374> 0' will be added to the list in place of any of their cards.
